title.rendered: Multi-cloud CI/CD – Kubernetes Failover Across Clouds

content.rendered:
Multi-cloud Kubernetes is all about mitigating risk between hosting providers. In this webinar, Dan Garfield shows you how to leverage Kubernetes as your universal cloud API, stand up clusters in Google, Amazon, and Azure, setup multi-deploy so our application is in several locations, and demonstrate failover should one cloud fail.

Click on the webinar link below to see:
– Continuous Delivery to multiple Kubernetes providers
– Cluster creation on multiple clouds from a single interface
– How to create failover rules
– A practical guide on how to set it up for yourself

Watch the Webinar

You can also view the slide deck below:

Multi-cloud CI/CD with failover powered by K8s, Istio, Helm, and Codefresh from Codefresh

New to Codefresh? Get started with Codefresh by signing up for an account today!
